title: Buidler-evm stack trace tests fail in node v14
body:
Running the buidler-evm stack trace tests fails in the following fashion:
```
$ node ../../node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test/internal/buidler-evm/stack-traces/test.ts 
(node:11957) DeprecationWarning: Configuration via mocha.opts is DEPRECATED and will be removed from a future version of Mocha. Use RC files or package.json instead.
(Use `node --trace-deprecation ...` to show where the warning was created)
  Stack traces
    Use compiler soljson-v0.6.0+commit.26b70077.js
      0_6
        function-types
          public-parameter
            Without optimizations
              1) test-files/0_6/function-types/public-parameter
  0 passing (91ms)
  1 failing
  1) Stack traces
       Use compiler soljson-v0.6.0+commit.26b70077.js
         0_6
           function-types
             public-parameter
               Without optimizations
                 test-files/0_6/function-types/public-parameter:
     Uncaught Error: Callback was already called.
      at /home/scn/Repos/Ethereum/nomiclabs/buidler/packages/buidler-core/node_modules/@nomiclabs/ethereumjs-vm/node_modules/merkle-patricia-tree/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:43:36
      at WriteStream.<anonymous> (node_modules/@nomiclabs/ethereumjs-vm/node_modules/merkle-patricia-tree/node_modules/async/lib/async.js:358:17)
      at WriteStream.destroy (node_modules/level-ws/level-ws.js:140:8)
      at finish (_stream_writable.js:658:14)
      at processTicksAndRejections (internal/process/task_queues.js:80:21)
      at runNextTicks (internal/process/task_queues.js:62:3)
      at processImmediate (internal/timers.js:431:9)
(node:11957) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: Error: done() called multiple times in test <Stack traces Use compiler soljson-v0.6.0+commit.26b70077.js 0_6 function-types public-parameter Without optimizations test-files/0_6/function-types/public-parameter> of file /home/scn/Repos/Ethereum/nomiclabs/buidler/packages/buidler-core/test/internal/buidler-evm/stack-traces/test.ts
    at createMultipleDoneError (/home/scn/Repos/Ethereum/nomiclabs/buidler/node_modules/mocha/lib/errors.js:289:13)
    at multiple (/home/scn/Repos/Ethereum/nomiclabs/buidler/node_modules/mocha/lib/runnable.js:294:24)
    at done (/home/scn/Repos/Ethereum/nomiclabs/buidler/node_modules/mocha/lib/runnable.js:305:14)
    at /home/scn/Repos/Ethereum/nomiclabs/buidler/node_modules/mocha/lib/runnable.js:379:11
(node:11957) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: Unhandled promise rejection. This error originated either by throwing inside of an async function without a catch block, or by rejecting a promise which was not handled with .catch(). To terminate the node process on unhandled promise rejection, use the CLI flag `--unhandled-rejections=strict` (see https://nodejs.org/api/cli.html#cli_unhandled_rejections_mode). (rejection id: 3)
(node:11957) [DEP0018] DeprecationWarning: Unhandled promise rejections are deprecated. In the future, promise rejections that are not handled will terminate the Node.js process with a non-zero exit code.
```

To reproduce:
- Use node v14.
- Select only one test. You can do this by setting the `only` field in a test specification json to true.
- Run the tests defined in [test/internal/buidler-evm/stack-traces/test.ts](https://github.com/nomiclabs/buidler/blob/development/packages/buidler-core/test/internal/buidler-evm/stack-traces/test.ts).

From what I've seen, it is probable that the old async library used by `merkle-patricia-tree` is to blame. See the [async changelog](https://github.com/caolan/async/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#bug-fixes-2).
